concept.title: Create classifications
concept.shortdesc: Before importing attribute data into your report suite, create the appropriate classifications. Once created, you use Classification Importer to import data files that specify the attribute values for each of the variable’s classifications.

conbody.p: Classification settings apply settings retroactively, so changes made to a classification’s configuration affects all classification reports, regardless of the report’s date range.

ol.li:
Navigate to Analytics > Admin Tools to create the desired classifications.
See Traffic Classifications and Conversion Classifications.

Create a classifications data file to populate the classifications with data. Classifications follow the character limits used in marketing reports and analytics data collection.
See Allowable Characters for more information about character limits in marketing reports and analytics.
